mapper.insert: insert into dm_user (USER_ID, LOGON_NAME, USER_NAME, HEAD_IMAGE, EMAIL, PASSWD, PASSWD_QUESTION, PASSWD_ANSWER, STATE, CREATE_TIME, ACTIVE_TIME, MODIFY_PWD_TIME, LOCK_TIME, LOGON_FAILED_COUNT, LAST_LOGIN_TIME ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwdQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwdAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyPwdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logonFailedCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into dm_user (LOGON_NAME, PASSWD, STATE, CREATE_TIME, LOGON_FAILED_COUNT, LAST_LOGIN_TIME) values (#{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_format(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %T'), #{logonFailedCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_format(#{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %T'))

update dm_user
LOGON_NAME = #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD_IMAGE = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD_QUESTION = #{passwdQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD_ANSWER = #{passwdAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_PWD_TIME = #{modifyPwdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGON_FAILED_COUNT = #{logonFailedCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dm_user set LOGON_NAME = #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEAD_IMAGE = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWD_QUESTION = #{passwdQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWD_ANSWER = #{passwdAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_PWD_TIME = #{modifyPwdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGON_FAILED_COUNT = #{logonFailedCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

LOGON_NAME = #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
